name: burgoo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a stew from the western US, made from whatever meats and vegetables are available cooked slowly together, especially served to large groups of people at outdoor events: They were selling Kentucky burgoo and cornbread. Most start with a brunch, which is likely to include fried chicken and burgoo stew (beef, chicken, and pork).
More examplesFewer examplesThe aromas of sizzling chicken, bubbling burgoo and roasting mutton complete the festival atmosphere.Kentucky's burgoo is a mutton stew that used to be cooked over an open fire in huge cauldrons.
